name: Cellar’s Nocturne
description:
It started with my grandma singing to herself while preparing meals. Then she got lost in the basement searching for a strawberry jam and we found her sitting on the chair, moving her head up and down to an unknown tune. She was away for minutes, hours, days and then she started dancing in our basement. But it’s not the worst part.

The worst part is I hear the music, too.

[DESCRIPTION]

Cellar’s Nocturne is another weird game provided by Serious Games Manufacture team. This time we present an experimental adventure point-and-click horror with a retro (2000’s) vibe to it. You’re a nameless person who is searching for their grandma in a weird, creepy, enormous and most importantly LOOPING basement. There is many things that loop in this game: grandma’s dance, the cellar, the music and finally the game itself.

Explore the rooms and discover the secrets of Cellar’s Nocturne. We recomment playing this game in the darknkess with headphones on for the best esperience!
